CustomField.description: LEM-18171 This field is used on the Services Related List on Store Account
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( TEXT(Order_Product__r.Product2.Family) == "Marketplace Promotion", TEXT(Order_Product__r.Product2.Family) == "Advertisement" ), true, false )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sets to true if the Services is related to Ads and Promos
CustomField.label: Ads&Promos Service?
